{Education for the mentally handicapped
The Chadwell Centre is situated at the junction of Grove and Gresham Roads. It is 4 years old and caters for 180 {adults}with various types of mental handicap. Yet at the Centre, they experience a wealth of educational discovery methods and situations.
The staff of the Chadwell centre have endeavoured to{utilise the local area {and community}for many of their teaching sessions. The people are encouraged to use local shops, public houses, cafes and other amenities on a regular basis.
Mgr. George Hanrahan. (St Bede's)
